comments.creator: mail@lukewagner.name
comments.author: mail@lukewagner.name
comments.raw_text:
pdf.js is an important JS application that does a lot of computation and where performance matters.  We should make a shell version of this that snarfs .pdf files so that we can compare engine perf, find optimization opportunities, etc.  Also, it seems like a shell version would be useful to the pdf.js guys for testing.

bdahl, could you post the github link?
comments.text:

Just a note, there's a pretty big change waiting to be merged that adds web worker support.
